thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Snezhana Zhurovich

author: Snezhana Zhurovich
title: Snezhana Zhurovich
text:
Flighthub is my first choice whenever I am looking to buy tickets, always easy to find options, all information is provided, everything is in place. Recently, I was looking for tickets to Montreal, found one at a price of $414 and just when I was about to purchase it, the box appeared on my screen telling me that now there's a ticket available for $369, wow!
Highly recommend and I am going to use only Flighthub, tried a few sites, so far Flighthub never disappointed!
